snippet: An appeal to Germans to realize that the actions of their own government have been responsible for the great upsurge of anti-German feeling in the United States was made by Thomas niann, exiled author, yesterday through the British radio....

headline.main: GERMANS WARNED BY THOMAS MANN; Plea Broadcast by the British Radio Says Berlin Regime Arouses World Hatred STRESSES PERIL IN GAINS Author Asserts Wish to Help Britain 'Is Very Great' in United States

lead_paragraph: An appeal to Germans to realize that the actions of their own government have been responsible for the great upsurge of anti-German feeling in the United States was made by Thomas niann, exiled author, yesterday through the British radio.
